# ðŸ§  SGR Refine Agent for LangGraph

**SGRRefineAgent** is a universal implementation of the **Structured-Guided-Refinement (SGR)** pattern  
for handling large contexts and producing structured outputs in **LangGraph**.

It allows iterative refinement of structured answers over multiple document chunks â€”  
essentially giving you **infinite context with schema consistency**.
